description: Every president except George Washington has called the White House home and has run the executive branch of the United States government from within its walls. Recognizable around the world, the White House stands as a symbol of democracy. The White House and its park grounds also serve as an iconic place for civil discourse.

openingHoursSpecification.description: The White House Visitor Center is located at 1450 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW and contains artifacts, an information desk, retail, and a 14 minute film.
openingHoursSpecification.name: White House Visitor Center

openingHoursSpecification.description: President's Park outdoor areas are open 24 hours/day, 7 days/week, including holidays. Areas may be temporarily closed for special events or Secret Service operations.
openingHoursSpecification.name: Park Hours
